About Me

Igor Simevski

My Career

Sentice Tech LLC

I started working as one of the first employees in Sentice Tech LLC, where besides leading several projects in several technologies, I am also involved in the setup and maintenance of all internal network and system architecture of the company.

August 2015
Senior Software Developer, Technical Lead & Sys Admin

Netcetera AG

I started my professional programming career at Netcetera AG in Skopje, where I was involved in several Java EE projects using various Java techonlogies, some of which: Spring, Hibernate, JDBC, Servlets, JSP, Struts, etc. Gained valuable knowledge.

June 2012
Java Software Engineer

Faculty of Electrical Engineering and IT, UKIM, Skopje

Assisted students in finishing laboratory tasks. Worked with PIC16F877a microcontroller. Subject: Mictoelectronics.

February 2011
Teaching Assistant

My Education

Faculty of Electrical Engineering and IT, UKIM, Skopje

Continued my studies involving several subjects from the fields of SoC and Nanoelectronics. Developed a C compiler for Dependable processor as a part of M.Sc. Thesis.

November 2011
M.Sc. Studies

Faculty of Electrical Engineering and IT, UKIM, Skopje

Received solid science and engineering knowledge base. Participated in few competitions for the Faculty, one of which "Hardware & Software" international competition in 2011 when our team won the first prize.

October 2007
B.Sc. Studies
